SELECT c.id, au.avatar, au.nickname, IF(ru.nickname is null,'æ— ',ru.nickname) as replyNickname, p.title as title, c.content, c.create_time FROM s_posts_comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM s_user_info ) au ON c.user_id = au.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, title FROM s_posts ) p ON c.posts_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM s_user_info ) ru ON c.posts_user_id = ru.id
au.nickname like concat('%',#{pageQuery.content},'%') or c.content like concat('%',#{pageQuery.content},'%') or p.title like concat('%',#{pageQuery.content},'%')
and c.deleted = 0
order by c.create_time desc
